mapper.insert: insert into product_info (product_id, product_name, product_explain, review_status, brand_id, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, product_price, product_up_time, product_down_time, category_Id, product_details, product_type) values (#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productDownTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select product_id, product_name, product_explain, review_status, brand_id, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, product_price, product_up_time, product_down_time, category_Id, product_details, product_type from product_info where product_id = #{product_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT pi.product_id AS productId, pi.product_name AS productName, pi.product_explain AS productExplain, pi.product_details AS productDetails, pi.product_price AS productPrice, pi.product_up_time AS productUpTime, pi.product_down_time AS productDownTime, pc.category_Id AS categoryId, pc.category_key AS categoryKey, pc.cname AS cname, pi.product_type AS productType FROM product_category pc LEFT JOIN product_info pi ON pc.category_Id = pi.category_Id WHERE pc.category_key = #{categoryKey} AND pi.review_status = 2
LIMIT #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT pi.product_id AS productId, pi.product_name AS productName, pi.product_price AS productPrice, pi.product_explain AS productExplain, pi.product_type AS productType FROM product_info pi WHERE pi.category_Id = #{categoryId} AND pi.review_status = 2 limit 10

SELECT pi.product_id AS productId, pi.product_name AS productName, pi.product_price AS productPrice, pi.product_explain AS productExplain, pi.product_type AS productType FROM product_info pi WHERE pi.category_Id = #{categoryId} AND pi.review_status = 2

SELECT pi.product_id AS productId, pi.product_name AS productName, pi.product_type AS productType, pi.category_Id AS categoryId, pc.cname AS cname, pi.brand_id AS brandId, pb.brand_name AS brandName, pi.product_price AS productPrice, pi.product_explain AS productExplain, pi.product_details AS productDetails, pi.description AS description, pi.product_type AS productType FROM product_info pi LEFT JOIN product_brand pb ON pi.brand_id = pb.brand_id LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON pi.category_Id = pc.category_Id WHERE pi.product_id = #{productId}
select count(0) from product_info where review_status=2 and category_Id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT pi.product_id as productId, pi.category_Id as categoryId, pi.product_name as productName, pb.brand_name as brandName, pi.product_price as productPrice, pi.product_type AS productType FROM product_info pi LEFT JOIN product_brand pb ON pi.brand_id = pb.brand_id WHERE pi.review_status=2 AND pi.category_Id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY pi.create_date DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT info.* FROM product_sku sku LEFT JOIN product_info info on sku.product_id = info.product_id GROUP BY sku.product_id ORDER BY sum(sku.product_sale_quantity) DESC
LIMIT 0, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}
